titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3231) to replace the Immigration and Naturalization Service with the Agency for Immigration Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-419, by Mr. Linder.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 145.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 396.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 384 - 36 (Roll no. 111).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 388 - 34 (Roll no. 112).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/24/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3231 (Immigration and Naturalization Service (INS) reform, and replacement of INS with the Agency for Immigration Affairs).
